Abscesses.sample_symptoms: My turtle has ruptured abscess with pus discharge, also lumps, swelling.

Air sac mites / gapeworms.sample_symptoms: My bird has excessive salivation, also open-mouth breathing, tail bobbing.

Arthritis.sample_symptoms: My dog has joint swelling and slowing down.

Aspergillosis.sample_symptoms: My bird has bone changes or misshaping of the upper respiratory tract, also lack of appetite.

Avian Gastric Yeast.sample_symptoms: My bird has excessive food intake followed by loss of appetite, also vomiting, weight loss, undigested seeds.

Avian Influenza.sample_symptoms: My bird has huddling or drooping posture and loss of appetite.

Avian Pox.sample_symptoms: reduced appetite, difficulty breathing if lesions in throat, wart-like lesions on featherless areas, scabs on feet and face, lesions around eyes beak and legs, lethargy

Breathing difficulties.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has reduced appetite, also wheezing, labored breathing.

Broken bones.sample_symptoms: My cat has broken bone protruding from the skin, also limping, swelling.

Bumblefoot.sample_symptoms: My bird has changes in behavior, also swelling on feet.

Candidiasis.sample_symptoms: My bird has difficulty swallowing, also white patches in mouth, regurgitation.

Candidiasis (Thrush).sample_symptoms: difficulty swallowing, white plaques in mouth and crop, lethargy, slowed crop emptying

Canine Distemper.sample_symptoms: loss of appetite, lethargy and depression, high fever

Canine Parvovirus.sample_symptoms: severe dehydration with sunken eyes, severe bloody diarrhea with foul odor, extreme lethargy and weakness

Canine distemper.sample_symptoms: I noticed my dog has coughing, discharge, seizures, fever.

Canine influenza.sample_symptoms: I'm worried, my dog has coughing, sneezing, lethargy.

Canine parvovirus.sample_symptoms: I'm worried, my dog has vomiting, diarrhea, lethargy.

Cat Acne.sample_symptoms: My cat has scabs and crusts, also chin blackheads, bumps.

Cataract.sample_symptoms: My bird has feather damage: excessive rubbing can lead to feather displacement over the eye., also cloudy eye.

Cataracts.sample_symptoms: My dog has rubbing face/head along the furniture and bulging of dogâs eye globe.

Cheek Pouch Impaction.sample_symptoms: drooling, swollen cheek that doesn't empty, selective eating

Chronic Kidney Disease.sample_symptoms: My cat has changes in behavior and muscle wasting.

Cloacal prolapse.sample_symptoms: My bird has signs of discomfort or distress when eliminating, also tissue protruding from vent.

Columnaris.sample_symptoms: lethargy, rapid breathing, white or gray patches on body, gill discoloration, loss of appetite

Conjunctivitis.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has swelling in eye, also red, runny eyes.

Corneal ulceration.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has pawing or rubbing and redness and swelling.

Demodectic Mange.urgency: medium (high if generalized with systemic signs like fever, lethargy, or draining wounds)

Dental Disease.sample_symptoms: drooling, red inflamed gums, visible tartar on teeth, bad breath with foul odor, difficulty eating or dropping food, pawing at mouth

Dental Disease (Malocclusion).sample_symptoms: selective eating preferring soft foods, swelling of jaw, overgrown teeth visible, weight loss despite trying to eat, difficulty eating or dropping food, drooling or wet chin

Diabetes.sample_symptoms: My dog has cataracts, also increased thirst.

Diarrhea.sample_symptoms: My dog has frequent vomiting, also visible stool change.

Dropsy.sample_symptoms: bulging eyes, scales sticking out like pinecone, complete loss of appetite, pale gills, staying at bottom of tank

Dystocia.sample_symptoms: My turtle has restlessness, also egg retention, swollen body.

E. cuniculi (Encephalitozoon).sample_symptoms: weakness in hind legs, seizures, loss of balance and rolling

Ear Infections (Otitis).sample_symptoms: foul odor from ears, head shaking and tilting, scratching at ears, discharge from ears (yellow, loss of balance, redness and swelling of ear canal

Ear Mites.sample_symptoms: intense scratching at ears, head shaking, strong odor from ears, inflammation of ear canal, dark brown or black ear discharge resembling coffee grounds, hair loss around ears from scratching

Ear infections.sample_symptoms: My dog has head tilt, also scratching ears, head shaking, discharge.

Ear mites.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has neck, also intense itching.

Egg Binding.sample_symptoms: sitting at bottom of cage, weakness, wide stance, straining to lay egg

Egg Retention.sample_symptoms: My fish has hiding behavior, also swollen abdomen.

Egg binding.sample_symptoms: My bird has sudden death in untreated or prolonged cases and wide-legged stance.

Eye Infections.sample_symptoms: loss of appetite due to inability to see food, swollen puffy eyelids, discharge from eyes, unable to open eyes, lethargy

Eye abscesses / conjunctivitis.sample_symptoms: My turtle has nasal discharge and eye that protrudes or bulges.

Feather Plucking.sample_symptoms: irritated red skin in plucked areas, missing feathers due to self-plucking, damaged or broken feathers

Feather cysts.sample_symptoms: My bird has discomfort: birds with feather cysts may exhibit signs of discomfort,, also lump under skin.

Feline Calicivirus.sample_symptoms: ulcers on tongue and gums, difficulty eating due to mouth pain, drooling, loss of appetite, fever

Feline Immunodeficiency Virus.sample_symptoms: My cat has neurologic problems like weakness, seizures, or odd behaviors and redness or sores in the mouth.

Feline Infectious Peritonitis.sample_symptoms: My cat has incoordination, also swollen abdomen, fever, lethargy.

Feline Leukemia Virus.sample_symptoms: My cat has chronic skin, eye, respiratory, or urinary tract infections and inflamed gums and mouth.

Feline Lower Urinary Tract Disease.sample_symptoms: My cat has vocalizing while urinating, also straining to urinate, blood in urine.

Feline Panleukopenia.sample_symptoms: severe dehydration, complete loss of appetite, severe vomiting, hiding behavior and depression, high fever then hypothermia

Feline Panleukopenia Virus.sample_symptoms: My cat has fever, also vomiting, lethargy, diarrhea.

Fin Rot.sample_symptoms: My fish has milky appearance at fin margins and redness at base of fins.

Flea Allergy Dermatitis.urgency: medium (high if severe anemia is present)

Fleas.sample_symptoms: My dog has chewing at their skin, also frequent itching.

Flystrike.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has presence of fly larvae, also maggots, skin wounds.

Flystrike (Myiasis).sample_symptoms: open wounds or ulcers, lethargy and shock, foul smell, visible fly larvae (maggots) on skin

Food Allergies.urgency: medium (high if anaphylaxis symptoms like facial swelling or hives are present)

Fractures.sample_symptoms: My bird has inability to fly and inability to move a limb.

Fungus.sample_symptoms: My fish has loss of appetite and patches that look like cotton balls.

Fur Mites.sample_symptoms: crusts on skin, hair loss especially on back and neck, secondary skin infections

Gastroenteritis.sample_symptoms: loss of appetite, lethargy and weakness, abdominal pain and cramping, vomiting multiple times

Gastrointestinal Stasis.sample_symptoms: obvious pain, no fecal pellets for 12 hours or more, small dry fecal pellets if any, grinding teeth due to discomfort, bloated or hard distended abdomen, loss of appetite

Gastrointestinal stasis.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has abdominal pain when touched, also no droppings, lethargy.

Giardiasis.sample_symptoms: My bird has increased vocalization in the infected bird and weight loss.

Gingivitis.sample_symptoms: My cat has dropping food, also red, swollen gums.

Gout.sample_symptoms: My bird has makes noise when walking due to discomfort, also swollen joints, white deposits.

Hair loss / alopecia.sample_symptoms: My hamster has lethargy and patches of short hair.

Hairballs.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has lethargy, also loss of appetite, small droppings.

Heartworms.sample_symptoms: My dog has excessive panting, also coughing, fatigue, exercise intolerance â still visible symptoms.

Heat Stress.sample_symptoms: drooling, rapid panting and open-mouth breathing, trembling or seizures, loss of appetite, lethargy and weakness, lying stretched out

Ich (White Spot Disease).sample_symptoms: clamped fins held close to body, rubbing against objects (flashing), rapid gill movement, gasping at water surface

Intestinal Parasites.sample_symptoms: My cat has pale mucous membranes, also worms in stool, diarrhea.

Intestinal Parasites (Worms).sample_symptoms: dull coat, scooting rear end on ground, visible worms in feces or vomit, vomiting, pot-bellied appearance, weight loss despite eating

Kennel Cough.sample_symptoms: dry hacking cough that sounds like honking, normal appetite and energy, coughing worsens with excitement or exercise, clear nasal discharge

Mange (Scabies).sample_symptoms: intense itching especially at night, unpleasant skin odor, hair loss starting at ears and elbows, secondary bacterial skin infections, thick crusty skin lesions

Metabolic Bone Disease.sample_symptoms: extreme lethargy, jaw that appears rubbery or flexible, tremors or seizures, soft or deformed shell, swollen limbs

Mites.sample_symptoms: constant scratching and preening, feather loss, restlessness at night, tiny mites visible on skin, crusty lesions around beak and eyes

Nutritional Deficiencies.sample_symptoms: muscle tremors, difficulty perching, poor feather quality, beak overgrowth or deformities, seizures, complete exhaustion, skeletal deformities

Obesity.sample_symptoms: My dog has being unable to feel the ribs, also visible weight gain.

Pasteurellosis (Snuffles).sample_symptoms: matted fur on front paws from wiping nose, eye discharge, loss of appetite and lethargy, labored breathing

Pneumonia.sample_symptoms: My rabbit has coughing is not usually a symptom seen in rabbits and excessive salivation.

Psittacosis (Chlamydiosis).sample_symptoms: weakness and inability to perch, loss of appetite, conjunctivitis with swollen eyes, labored breathing and tail bobbing, complete exhaustion, nasal discharge

Rabies.sample_symptoms: My dog has difficulty breathing, also behavioral change, aggression, paralysis.

Respiratory Infections.sample_symptoms: sneezing and nasal discharge, tail bobbing, lethargy and fluffed feathers, wheezing sounds, reduced appetite

Ringworm.sample_symptoms: My hamster has scaly or crusty skin, also circular bald patches.

Shell Rot.sample_symptoms: soft spots on shell, discolored patches on shell, complete loss of appetite, pitting or holes in shell, lethargy, foul smell from shell, discharge from affected areas

Skin Allergies.sample_symptoms: overgrooming leading to bald patches, red inflamed skin, hair loss especially on belly and legs, small scabs on skin, excessive grooming and licking

Skin Allergies (Atopic Dermatitis).sample_symptoms: red inflamed skin especially on paws and belly, constant scratching and licking, hair loss in patches, skin rashes and hot spots

Skin Mites.sample_symptoms: dry flaky skin, restlessness and inability to sleep, intense scratching

Sore Hocks.sample_symptoms: hair loss on bottom of hind feet, reluctance to move, weight shifting when sitting, scabs or open sores on feet

Swim Bladder Disease.sample_symptoms: My fish has struggling to swim normally, also abnormal floating or sinking.

Tick Fever (Ehrlichiosis).sample_symptoms: lethargy and weakness, high fever that comes and goes, swollen lymph nodes

Tumors.sample_symptoms: loss of appetite, visible lump under skin, lethargy

Upper Respiratory Infection.sample_symptoms: My cat has difficulty breathing and decreased or absent appetite.

Uterine Cancer.sample_symptoms: lethargy and weakness, increased urination frequency, selective eating, mammary gland cysts or tumors, enlarged abdomen, blood in urine, difficulty breathing

Vitamin A Deficiency.sample_symptoms: thickened skin, difficulty seeing or blindness, reduced appetite, swollen eyelids unable to open, respiratory infections

Wet Tail (Proliferative Ileitis).sample_symptoms: dehydration, watery diarrhea with foul odor, loss of appetite, wet matted fur around tail, irritability when handled, weight loss, complete exhaustion
